title: client chat not connecting/working?
body:
i got into a game and it wasn't connecting me to the lobby chat
in-game, it turns out the problem was affecting everyone else too
i can't even change my status message or message anyone in my friends list
tasukete :(
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
Hmmmm that's pretty odd. That would definitely make things rather hard to deal with without being able to talk. The chat servers need a separate connection, so something must have gone wrong when your network was loading the match. 

Run through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick to cover the basics, but be sure to hit up the techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if nothing seems to help!
